categories: Category:Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire

nodes.text: Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide

The Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide (also known as the Shadows of the Empire Planets Collection) was a sourcebook published in 1996 by West End Games for their roleplaying game. Featuring information on planets from Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire, it was written by John Beyer.

The Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide features comprehensive coverage of the new planets of Steve Perry's best-selling Shadows of the Empire novel—from geography and politics to military organizations and famous people. Each chapter includes detailed adventure outlines. You and your group can be exploring the planets of Shadows of the Empire in no time.
Borsk Fey'lya is misspelled Borsk Fel'la in this book.
